entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
